snippet: President Rafael Correa said some taxes would rise to help pay for rebuilding homes, roads and buildings destroyed by the earthquake.
abstract: Ecuadorean Pres Rafael Correa announces some taxes will temporarily increase and country may issue new bonds to help fund earthquake recovery efforts; earthquake of magnitude 6.2 hits coast, briefly interrupting efforts to rescue survivors from previous 7.8-magnitude quake.
lead_paragraph: President Rafael Correa said some taxes would rise to help pay for rebuilding homes, roads and buildings destroyed by the earthquake.

headline.main: Ecuador’s President Announces Steps to Fund Quake Recovery
headline.print_headline: President of Ecuador Announces Quake Relief
